question.text:
Over 'Oxbridge' bestaan verschillende misvattingen.
Geef van de volgende misvattingen aan of Sir Anthony Seldon deze noemt in zijn brief.
Noteer 'wel' of 'niet' achter elk nummer op het antwoordblad.
1 Cambridge and Oxford are superior to other universities in the UK.
2 Students have to be exceptionally intelligent to be accepted at Oxbridge.
3 Studying at an Oxbridge university guarantees a successful climb up the social ladder.
4 The universities of Oxford and Cambridge discriminate against state school pupils.
